name: mcp-server-armor-crypto
description: Blockchain integration, staking, DeFi, swap, bridging, wallet, DCA, Orders, Coin Lookup, Tracking.

rating.reason: Tool names are clear and descriptive, indicating their purpose well. Most descriptions adequately explain functionality with 2-3 sentences and provide basic usage context. Parameter descriptions are generally clear with good detail about expected values and cross-references to other tools. Some tools like 'calculator' have excellent comprehensive descriptions, while others like 'wait_a_moment' and 'get_current_time' are more basic but adequate. Overall good documentation quality with minor gaps in some areas.
